text: Kono yō ni shite, ware wa kare-ra no shōsoku o akarumi ni dashita. Sore wa arrā no yakusoku ga shinjitsudeari, mata (Saigonoshinpan no)-ji ni tsuite wa, utagai no nai koto o shiraseru tamedearu. Suruto hitobito wa kare-ra no jiken ni tsuki tagaini ronji,(hitori ga) itta. `Kare-ra no ue ni tatemono o tateyou. Omo wa, kare-ra (no shin'i) o mottomo yoku shitte ora remasu.'
